function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential exposure to coronavirus on construction sites due to close proximity of workers","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and illness among construction workers","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, staggered shifts, and regular disinfection of tools and equipment","Technologies":"Thermal scanners, contactless temperature measurement devices, disinfection tunnels","People":"Construction workers, contractors, and on-site trades","Owner":"Construction companies, contractors, and project managers"},{"Description":"Decreased demand for construction projects due to unemployment and low growth","Impact":"Reduced revenue and lower profitability for construction companies","Mitigation":"Diversifying services, targeting new markets, and identifying cost-saving measures","Technologies":"Project management software, market analysis tools, cost estimation software","People":"Construction company owners, project managers, and financial managers","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, and financial departments"}]}
